title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 72.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 72.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to investments made by savings banks
and savings and loan associations on and after June 19, 1974, but shall not
require the disposition of any investment theretofore made, not in conformity
with this Part, prior to normal or earliest optional maturity date of such
investment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
72.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
